about_the_game:
Dust & Courage: Jake Bolton’s Journey is an isometric single-player RPG set in a historical fantasy rendition of Wild West America. This adventure is as much yours as it is Jake Bolton's! Shape the game with your dialogue choices, determining who becomes your enemy and your friend. Customize your character and become the cowboy you want to be in this sandbox experience.

From the moment you hit the dusty trails, the control is in your hands. You'll meet many different characters and dive into numerous stories. Which ones you choose to follow is up to you. Whether you choose to resolve conflicts through diplomacy or brute force, every decision will have consequences that ripple throughout the world! You will forge alliances, uncover secrets, and shape the course of your adventure.

The gameplay offers a mix of strategic combat, exploration, and puzzle-solving. Engage in diplomatic negotiations or intense battles, using various weapons and skills. The world is filled with hidden treasures and secrets.

  • Dynamic events, like random encounters and weather changes, add unpredictability.

  • Real-time combat features a range of weapons from melee to firearms. Tackle challenges diplomatically or aggressively—solve problems with words or bullets.

  • Enemies have weaknesses and resistances, so choose your weapons strategically.

  • Use items and the environment to outsmart opponents.

  • Progress by completing quests and earning experience points to level up and gain new abilities and skills.

As you progress, you can level up Jake Bolton's skills and abilities, including proficiency with various weapons, persuasion, and survival skills. Abilities range from combat techniques to social skills like charisma and intimidation.

Your dialogue choices and actions shape Jake's alignment and personality traits. You can become a righteous hero, a cunning outlaw, or anything in between, affecting NPC interactions and unlocking specific story paths and quests. Interactions with NPCs and factions influence Jake's relationships and reputation. Positive relationships can lead to allies, quest assistance, and exclusive items, while negative actions may result in enemies and closed-off opportunities.
